moreBlocks.articles:
• About the Law offices of Kelly L. Anderson
    We are here to help! We work hard to gather the important facts regarding your accident, deal with the insurance companies and get the compensation your deserve.
  • Nursing Home Abuse
    Has your elderly loved one been neglected or abused by those being paid to care for them? Contact us for a free consultation to understand your loved one’s rights.
  • Wrongful Death
    Do you have a family member who has died because of carelessness of another person or business? Let the Law Offices of Kelly L. Anderson help to gain compensation for medical and burial expenses, pain and suffering and lost wages of the deceased.
  • Car Accidents
    At the Law Offices of Kelly L. Anderson we work hard to earn the appropriate compensation for your injuries which resulted from a car accident.
  • Useful Information and FAQ
    Find information and answers to questions frequently asked by our clients regarding personal injury law.

description:
An Experienced Personal Injury Law Firm in Medford, Oregon

Seeking Justice, One Person at a Time

When you've been forced to deal with serious injuries or the loss of a loved one because of the careless actions of another, life can suddenly become very frustrating. Insurance companies, medical treatments and a complex legal system often only make matters worse.

At the Law Offices of Anderson, Morse & Linthorst, we help people throughout Oregon navigate the legal system and secure the financial resources they need to put their lives back on track. Our passion for correcting injustice and helping people obtain the compensation they deserve never wavers. Our attorneys are experienced and highly skilled at resolving cases using all available means, including informal negotiation, mediation and trial.

We Enjoy Challenging Cases that Achieve Successful Outcomes

Our practice is dedicated solely to helping accident victims and their families. We have represented clients in thousands of personal injury claims in Oregon, handling everything from relatively simple car accident cases involving minor injuries to complex cases involving medical malpractice or product liability law.

We offer extensive experience with a wide variety of personal injury cases, including:

  • Motor vehicle accident claims – involving cars, motorcycles, trucks, commercial vehicles, buses, aircraft, boats, recreational vehicles, drunk drivers and more
  • Bicycle accident and pedestrian accident claims
  • Construction site and workplace accident claims
  • Property owner negligence claims – premises liability, dog bite injuries, slip-and-fall accidents
  • Health care negligence claims – including medical malpractice claims and nursing home abuse or neglect claims
  • Professional malpractice claims – legal, medical, etc.
  • Dangerous or defective product claims
  • Sexual abuse or assault claims
  • Claims involving catastrophic injuries or wrongful death

Our Attorneys

Our law firm's founder, Kelly Andersen, has been a practicing trial attorney for more than 32 years. Mr. Andersen has written a number of articles on personal injury and trial practice topics for bar associations and professional organizations, and has also given numerous presentations. He also holds an AV Preeminent* rating through Martindale-Hubbell, is included in the Oregon Super Lawyers listings, and is a member of both the Multimillion Dollar Advocates Forum and the Society of Outstanding Lawyers of America.

Faith M. Morse graduated magna cum laude from the Willamette University College of Law, where she also received the National Association of Women Lawyers Outstanding Law Graduate Award and the Bruce Spaulding Memorial Award for Trial Advocacy.

Contact the Law Offices of Anderson, Morse & Linthorst

As a service to the larger community, we offer initial consultations free of charge, with no strings attached. During this consultation, we will let you know what your legal rights are, how we can help you and whether or not you need an attorney. If you do have a case and agree that our law firm should represent you, there will be no up-front costs to pay. We will only be paid if we obtain a verdict or settlement on your behalf.

To schedule a consultation with one of our attorneys, call us any time at 541-773-7000 or toll free at 800-637-6622. If you would prefer to reach us online, complete our brief e-mail contact form and someone from our office will get in touch with you shortly.
